price: Fakkaatuma waan warri duraanii jedhanii jedhan.
arabic: بَلۡ قَالُواْ مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bal qālū mith'la mā qāla al-awalūna
